subject: Baseball
Hurricane Katrina
lead_paragraph: Ken Oberkfell, the Class AAA manager for the Mets, spent 12 bewildering days in the hospital 17 months ago wondering why his left leg was filled with blood clots.
snippet: Ken Oberkfell, the Class AAA manager for the Mets, spent 12 bewildering days in the hospital 17 months ago wondering why his left leg was filled with blood clots.
